description.ko: 고공에서 바라본 마른 강바닥, 갈라진 토양, 거친 지질학적 형성물의 복잡한 패턴을 포착하여 지구의 자연 표면을 상세하게 탐구합니다.
description.en: A detailed exploration of Earth's natural surfaces, capturing the intricate patterns of dried riverbeds, cracked soil, and rugged geological formations from a high-altitude perspective.

prompt: Hyper-realistic high-resolution satellite photography of earth textures, cracked dry ground, intricate geological patterns, aerial view, cinematic lighting, earthy tones, detailed topography, 8k resolution, macro-texture of soil and rock formations.
